comments.raw_text:
Me and Matt discussed some improvements to the display list debugging UI.
We discussed:
(1) Make the information in a script friendly format.
(2) Split the UI into two panes. One listing the layers, the other showing information for the layer you are currently mousing over.
(3) Adding a debug menu entry.
comments.creator: b56girard@gmail.com
comments.author: b56girard@gmail.com
